entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries and rain showers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
